pkgmetadata.longdescription: Stellar CharactEristics Pisa Estimation gRid for Binary Systems // SCEPtER pipeline for estimating the stellar age for double- lined detached binary systems. The observational constraints adopted in the recovery are the effective temperature, the metallicity [Fe/H], the mass, and the radius of the two stars. The results are obtained adopting a maximum likelihood technique over a grid of pre-computed stellar models.
